tool_description: The API provides a programmable interface to the consolidated EU sanction list in oder to check individual persons, companies and organizations against this sanction list.
name: Consolidated Financial Sanctions List European Union
title: Consolidated Financial Sanctions List European Union
tool_name: Consolidated Financial Sanctions List European Union

api_list.name: 01_check_person
api_list.description:
Structure of the query URL for a person:
  https://index.smartapicloud.com/sl/<first name>/<last name>/

Structure of the json result string:

  {'result': True/False, 'data': {'firstname': 'data', 'lastname': 'data', 'wholename': 'data', 'born': 'data', 'country': 'data', 'city': 'data', 'zip': 'data', 'street': 'data', 'publication': 'data'}}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://consolidated-financial-sanctions-list-european-union.p.rapidapi.com/Allah Dad/Muhammad/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "consolidated-financial-sanctions-list-european-union.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://consolidated-financial-sanctions-list-european-union.p.rapidapi.com/{first_name}/{last_name}/"

headers = {

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
